title: Abbie Chatfield channels pop star's risqué selfie... despite rumoured romance with Todd King
text:
She's admitted she'd love to be the next Bachelorette.

But on Monday, Abbie Chatfield proved she'd be happy to settle for Liam Hemsworth in an instant.

Taking to her Instagram, the 23-year-old reality star channelled his ex-wife, Miley Cyrus, in a white crop-top and blue denim pants.

'If I keep dressing like Miley do you think Liam Hemsworth will give me a shot?' Abbie Chatfield channelled the pop star's risqué selfie on Monday

The blonde bombshell, who failed to match with 32-year-old astrophysicist Matt Agnew, cheekily captioned the snap, 'If I keep dressing like Miley do you think Liam will give me a shot?'

Her followers quick to comment underneath the snap.

Fellow Bachelor reject Helena Sauzier wrote: 'Your mum deserves a slow clap for creating you.'

One fan applauded her efforts, and comment: 'Yesss girl Byron Bay is not far'

One user commented: 'You’re far prettier and far more intelligent than Miley could hope to be.'

Another applauded her efforts, and said: 'Yesss girl Byron Bay is not far' referring to where Liam has been staying with brother Chris Hemsworth.

Meanwhile, the blonde star revealed she'd love to be the next Bachelorette.

Meanwhile, the 23-year-old star revealed she'd love to be the next Bachelorette

'But I think it's a really hard gig because you're basically by yourself … I'd definitely consider (it though), I think it would be lots of fun.'

Abbie made it to the finale of The Bachelor earlier this year, but was left heartbroken when astrophysicist Matt chose Chelsie McLeod instead.

In recent weeks, Abbie has been spotted enjoying herself with Bachelorette runner-up Todd King.
description: She's admitted she'd love to be the next Bachelorette.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
